title: What topic did you use for your university dissertation? - Quora

response.answer_text: If you mean for my final year project: “Superconductivity in UPt3”. This was 1989/90; it was a theoretical and computational project modelling the appropriate electron orbitals. Probably rather dated now (but that was 30 years ago).

Completed an MBA and my dissertation topic was# an investigation of the adequacy and effects of internal control systems on the growth and sustainability of small and medium sized enterprises in the south West region#
